articles.title: Champagne and a sea of egg and bacon: Lord’s lays bare cricket’s class divide
articles.description: The home of cricket hosts the second Ashes Test, but, as Sonia Twigg discusses, Lord’s provides insight into the sport’s troubling past and may not be helping its future

articles.title: England 'too casual' for Ashes cricket - Vaughan
articles.description: England were "too casual" on day one of the second Ashes Test and must realise the contest "is not just another game", says ex-captain Michael Vaughan.
articles.content:
England were "too casual" on day one of the second Ashes Test and must realise the contest "is not just another game", says former captain Michael Vaughan.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
